video.title: Comic Book Men
video.synopsis: Set in Jay and Silent Bob's Secret Stash comic book emporium, this unscripted series unveils the culture thriving in a neighborhood comics store.

episodes.synopsis: Walt and the guys decide to throw a birthday party at the Stash. One customer comes in with a larger than life Darth Vader helmet.
episodes.title: Stash Bashes

episodes.synopsis: The guys head to a local auction with a wager on the line. One customer learns that mixing cigars and comic books never works out.
episodes.title: My Big Fat Geek Wedding

episodes.synopsis: The guys hunt for the Jersey Devil. One customer tries to sell his Thundercat figures, and finds that loose items aren't always popular.
episodes.title: Ghostbusting at the Stash

episodes.synopsis: With Walt and Mike sick, it's up to Ming to run the Stash by himself. A customer comes in to sell first issues of Iron Man and Daredevil.
episodes.title: Ming in Charge

episodes.synopsis: To unload their inventory, Ming organizes the Stash to join in on the local sidewalk sale. Walt sells some early Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles comics.
episodes.title: The Sidewalk Stash

episodes.synopsis: Mike and Ming participate in a 5K zombie run for Kevin's charity. Walt buys an unusual item containing signatures from the 1966 Batman TV show.
episodes.title: The Running Dead

episodes.synopsis: Kevin visits the Stash for a book signing and brings Jay along for security. A customer brings in original artwork from a beloved franchise.
episodes.title: Tough Sh*t

episodes.synopsis: The guys get ready for a visit from Stan Lee. Walt has a chance to buy the most valuable comic book written in the last 20 years.
episodes.title: Stan The Man

episodes.synopsis: The Stash will sell an independent comic book in order for the guys to see a costumed MMA fight. Walt buys a couple pairs of nostalgic underwear.
episodes.title: The Clash At The Stash

episodes.synopsis: The guys compete to make the best sandwich to represent the Stash. One of the world's most valuable comics comes web-slinging through the door.
episodes.title: Super Hoagie

episodes.synopsis: Walt negotiates for an original Asteroids arcade cabinet, but another customer has his own plans. Ming gets excited for GI Joes from his childhood.
episodes.title: Stash-teroids

episodes.synopsis: The Stash organizes an auction to help a friend sell his collection. A customer relates to one of Spider-Man's deadliest enemies.
episodes.title: Con Men

episodes.synopsis: A customer comes to the Secret Stash and tries to sell a popular gaming system with an unusual twist. Ming buys another piece of his childhood back.
episodes.title: Stash Wars

episodes.synopsis: The guys try their hand at creating their own comic book. Walt, with the help of pop culture expert Rob Bruce, buys a signed issue of Creepy.
episodes.title: Cryptozoic Men

episodes.synopsis: The guys pass the time with a game of charades with a comic book twist. Walt has a chance to buy original artwork from his favorite artist.
episodes.title: Comic Charades

episodes.synopsis: Ming plans a surprise for Walt's 15th anniversary at the Stash. Walt teaches Ming the virtue of patience when selling a Giant-Size X-Men #1.
episodes.title: Giant-Sized Anniversary

episodes.synopsis: Lou Ferrigno visits the Stash to give Bryan a lesson in fitness. A customer wants to buy a key comic by legendary artist and writer Frank Miller.
episodes.title: The Incredible Bulk

episodes.synopsis: Walt and the guys get invited to an actual bat cave. A customer wants to sell his collection of original "Star Wars" action figures.
episodes.title: To the Bat Cave

episodes.synopsis: The guys ask artist George Perez to help rebuild Mike's destroyed collection. A customer sells his set of vintage interactive comic books.
episodes.title: Super Friends

episodes.synopsis: Ming's interest is piqued when he has a chance to buy an oversized toy from the 1980s. A customer needs help taking his wife out on the perfect date.
episodes.title: USS Ming

episodes.synopsis: A superfan sells his Mr. T backyard water game and inspires Ming to have some cool fun on a hot day. Walt puts the shop's street cred on the line.
episodes.title: Pity the Fools

episodes.synopsis: The boys at the Stash try to strike it big by bidding on derelict storage units. Walt geeks out with a fellow "Elfquest" fanatic.
episodes.title: Walt's Big Gamble

episodes.synopsis: A "Dukes of Hazzard" fan stops by the shop in his General Lee to show off his collection of show memorabilia. Walt encounters his first "brony."
episodes.title: Dukes of Jersey

episodes.synopsis: The guys head to the Baltimore Comic Con to launch their comic book, "Cryptozoic Man." Meanwhile, Sunday Jeff works on a Saturday to fill in for Walt.
episodes.title: Cryptozoic Launch

episodes.synopsis: A customer buys a gift for his dad's 75th birthday, which reminds Walt that Superman is also 75. The Stash throws a party, inviting a special guest.
episodes.title: Superman's 75th

episodes.synopsis: Nichelle Nichols pays the Stash a visit, looking for an Uhura Mego doll from the 1970s. An "X-Men" fan buys the first appearance of the Phoenix.
episodes.title: Uhura's Uhura

episodes.synopsis: Walt's recent purchase of a Batman bowling ball inspires him to form a bowling team. An ill-conceived action figure makes its way to the Stash.
episodes.title: Pinheads

episodes.synopsis: A bored Walt decides to quiz the guys on comic book trivia, in which a wrong answer lands them a gumball. A customer sells his "Hellboy" prop replica.
episodes.title: Trivia Chew-Off

episodes.synopsis: The Stash helps auction off the work of legendary comic book inker Mike Esposito. Walt buys the epitome of cool in the form of a paper doll.
episodes.title: The Esposito Collection

episodes.synopsis: The guys have a chance to purchase a replica of the 1966 Batcycle. A customer sells his collection of Marvel fan magazines from the '70s.
episodes.title: Batcycle on Broad

episodes.synopsis: A college hopeful goes to the Stash to appraise his collection and learns the value of comic book grading. Walt buys Wayne Gretzky memorabilia.
episodes.title: Certified Guaranty

episodes.synopsis: Jason Mewes invites the guys to a Renaissance fair for medieval revelry. A customer brings in one of the most valuable items the Stash has ever seen.
episodes.title: Knights of the Stash
